title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 601.13 - Approval of plans by the department of health
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 601.13 - Approval of plans by the department of health

State Regulations

Contract plans and specifications, or changes thereto, for
a public water supply system for which a permit has been issued by the
department are subject to review and approval by the Department of Health prior
to the commencement of construction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
601.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
